edu.washington.cs.cse490h.lib
Class NodeContainer

java.lang.Object
  edu.washington.cs.cse490h.lib.NodeContainer

 class NodeContainer
extends java.lang.Object

A container that represents an address. It either wraps an emulated node, or a queue of messages to a failed node.
